title: Farmhouse Fixer: Camp Revamp
overview: Jonathan Knight, best known as a member of the Grammy(R)-nominated band New Kids on the Block and star of popular HGTV series Farmhouse Fixer, will tackle his next renovation project in the new four-episode spin-off series, Farmhouse Fixer: Camp Revamp. Jon will enlist the help of his family, including his brother and fellow NKOTB member Jordan Knight, to renovate multiple structures on a newly acquired property to create a stunning summer retreat for guests.
